#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
using namespace std;

int gcd_iter(int u, int v) {
  int t;
  while (v) {
    t = u; 
    u = v; 
    v = t % v;
  }
  return u < 0 ? -u : u; /* abs(u) */
}
int main() {
	
	
	int test;
	cin>>test;
	
	while(test--)
	{
		int a,b;
		scanf("%d%d",&a,&b);
		
		int g=gcd_iter(a,b);
		
		a/=g;
		b/=g;
		
		if(a>2*b)
			cout<<"NO";
		
		else if(a==1)
		{
			while(b%2==0)
			b/=2;
			b++;
			while(b%2==0)
			b/=2;
			if(b==1)
			cout<<"YES";
			else
			cout<<"NO";
			
		}
		
		
		else
		{
			while(a%2==0)
			a/=2;
			
			if(a!=1)
			{
				cout<<"NO";
			}
			
			else
			{
				b++;
				while(b%2==0)
				b/=2;
				if(b==1)
				cout<<"YES";
				else
				cout<<"NO";
			}
			
			
				
			}
		
					cout<<endl;

		
		
			
		
	}

}
